title: Chronorift Cove
shortDescription: Stabilize shimmering tides and rescue explorers from a time-torn harbor.
longDescription: The cove fractures in waves of time. Activate chrono buoys, anchor the currents, and chart a safe path before the anomaly swallows the harbor.

canonicalGame.title: Chronorift Cove
canonicalGame.shortDescription: Stabilize time-tossed tides and guide explorers through a shimmering coastal rift.
